W03_LTXT_COMM_GLUTTONY_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W03_LTXT_COMM_GLUTTONY_000_DETAIL.text: One of the watchtowers built to protect the Dark Castle. It presides over the dark virtue of gluttony. The odor of rotting food fills the air around it, attracting both animals and insects.

W03_LTXT_COMM_LUST_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W03_LTXT_COMM_LUST_000_DETAIL.text: One of the watchtowers built to protect the Dark Castle. It presides over the dark virtue of lust. A seductive smell fills the air around it, while suspicious shadows lie in wait for some dark purpose.

W03_LTXT_COMM_SLOTH_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W03_LTXT_COMM_SLOTH_000_DETAIL.text: One of the watchtowers built to protect the Dark Castle. It presides over the dark virtue of sloth. The air is dank and stagnant, and listless things lie about here and there.

W03_LTXT_COMM_RAGE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W03_LTXT_COMM_RAGE_000_DETAIL.text: One of the watchtowers built to protect the Dark Castle. It presides over the dark virtue of wrath. Aggression fills the air around it, while warriors with bloodshot eyes do battle nearby.

W03_LTXT_COMM_GLUTTONY_SUPER_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W03_LTXT_COMM_GLUTTONY_SUPER_000_DETAIL.text: The Warden of Gluttony, he who devours all, lives in this tower. It has a deeply distorted presence.

W03_LTXT_COMM_LUST_SUPER_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W03_LTXT_COMM_LUST_SUPER_000_DETAIL.text: The Warden of Lust, he who derives pleasure from the suffering of others, lives in this tower. It has a deeply distorted presence.

W03_LTXT_COMM_SLOTH_SUPER_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W03_LTXT_COMM_SLOTH_SUPER_000_DETAIL.text: The Warden of Sloth, he who uses others to carry out his evil will, lives in this tower. It has a deeply distorted presence.

W03_LTXT_COMM_RAGE_SUPER_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W03_LTXT_COMM_RAGE_SUPER_000_DETAIL.text: The Warden of Wrath, he who is ever burning with rage, lives in this tower. It has a deeply distorted presence.

W03_LTXT_COMM_GRAVEYARD_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W03_LTXT_COMM_GRAVEYARD_000_DETAIL.text: The headstones in this graveyard stick haphazardly out of the ground like crooked teeth. It is said you can still hear the groans of those buried here.

W03_LTXT_COMM_TOWN_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W03_LTXT_COMM_TOWN_000_DETAIL.text: A town full of lifeless beings devoid of all vitality. Its residents show no attachment to life.

W03_LTXT_COMM_WELL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W03_LTXT_COMM_WELL_000_DETAIL.text: An old well. You've no idea how deep it goes, and no one has ever tried gathering water from it.

W03_LTXT_COMM_ROSE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W03_LTXT_COMM_ROSE_000_DETAIL.text: A ruin that somewhat resembles the watchtower it used to be. It's covered in roses and ivy.

W03_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W03_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_000_DETAIL.text: This building towers into the sky in the center of Yomi. It is home to this world's ruler, the Dismal King.

W03_EVAR_COMM_ALL_GLUTTONY_TOWER_000_DET.speaker: UI
W03_EVAR_COMM_ALL_GLUTTONY_TOWER_000_DET.text: One of the watchtowers built to protect the Dark Castle. It presides over the dark virtue of gluttony. The odor of rotting food fills the air around it, attracting both animals and insects.

W03_EVAR_COMM_ALL_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_DETA.speaker: UI
W03_EVAR_COMM_ALL_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_DETA.text: Can you acquire enough food to satisfy the Warden of Gluttony?

W03_EVAR_COMM_ALL_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.speaker: UI
W03_EVAR_COMM_ALL_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.text: You've heard you might obtain ingredients from this well that can satisfy even the Warden of Gluttony.

W03_EVAR_COMM_ALL_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: UI
W03_EVAR_COMM_ALL_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text: Does this town contain the secret to defeating the Warden of Gluttony in an eating contest?

W03_EVAR_COMM_ALL_LUST_TOWER_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W03_EVAR_COMM_ALL_LUST_TOWER_000_DETAIL.text: One of the watchtowers built to protect the Dark Castle. It presides over the dark virtue of lust. A seductive smell fills the air around it, while suspicious shadows lie in wait for some dark purpose.

W03_EVAR_COMM_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W03_EVAR_COMM_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_DETAIL.text: The sound of howling wolves fills the air. Perhaps you should stay away from this place.

W03_EVAR_COMM_ALL_SLOTH_TOWER_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W03_EVAR_COMM_ALL_SLOTH_TOWER_000_DETAIL.text: One of the watchtowers built to protect the Dark Castle. It presides over the dark virtue of sloth. The air is dank and stagnant, and listless things lie about here and there.

W03_EVAR_COMM_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W03_EVAR_COMM_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_DETAIL.text: One of the watchtowers built to protect the Dark Castle. It presides over the dark virtue of wrath. Aggression fills the air around it, while warriors with bloodshot eyes do battle nearby.

W03_EVAR_COMM_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_020_TITLE.speaker: UI
W03_EVAR_COMM_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_020_TITLE.text: Rematch with the Flames of Wrath

W03_EVAR_COMM_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_020_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W03_EVAR_COMM_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_020_DETAIL.text: Another battle with the Warden of Wrath seems unavoidable.

W03_EVAR_COMM_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_030_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W03_EVAR_COMM_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_030_DETAIL.text: This may be the perfect chance to acquire the key you seek.

W03_EVAR_COMM_CASTLE_DOOR_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W03_EVAR_COMM_CASTLE_DOOR_000_DETAIL.text: This building towers into the sky in the center of Yomi. It is home to this world's ruler, the Dismal King. The entrance is sealed.

W03_EVAR_COMM_CASTLE_FINAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W03_EVAR_COMM_CASTLE_FINAL_000_DETAIL.text: Open the doors of the Dark Castle so you might meet the Dismal King.

W03_EVAR_COMM_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_110_DET.speaker: UI
W03_EVAR_COMM_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_110_DET.text: It seems you have no choice but to once more meet with Dolores, the Warden of Pride.

W03_EVAR_COMM_BABY_GLUTTONY_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W03_EVAR_COMM_BABY_GLUTTONY_000_DETAIL.text: The warden refuses to accept the Dismal King's revival. Is fighting the only option here?

W03_EVAR_COMM_BABY_LUST_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W03_EVAR_COMM_BABY_LUST_000_DETAIL.text: The warden refuses to accept the Dismal King's revival. Is fighting the only option here?

W03_EVAR_COMM_BABY_SLOTH_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W03_EVAR_COMM_BABY_SLOTH_000_DETAIL.text: The warden refuses to accept the Dismal King's revival. Is fighting the only option here?

W03_EVAR_COMM_BABY_RAGE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W03_EVAR_COMM_BABY_RAGE_000_DETAIL.text: The warden refuses to accept the Dismal King's revival. Is fighting the only option here?

W03_EVAR_COMM_BABY_GLUTTONY_100_TITLE.speaker: UI
W03_EVAR_COMM_BABY_GLUTTONY_100_TITLE.text: Surrounded by Thralls: Tower of Gluttony

W03_EVAR_COMM_BABY_GLUTTONY_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W03_EVAR_COMM_BABY_GLUTTONY_100_DETAIL.text: The Dismal King's thralls have surrounded the tower. There's no point in stopping here.

W03_EVAR_COMM_BABY_LUST_100_TITLE.speaker: UI
W03_EVAR_COMM_BABY_LUST_100_TITLE.text: Surrounded by Thralls: Tower of Lust

W03_EVAR_COMM_BABY_LUST_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W03_EVAR_COMM_BABY_LUST_100_DETAIL.text: The Dismal King's thralls have surrounded the tower. There's no point in stopping here.

W03_EVAR_COMM_BABY_SLOTH_100_TITLE.speaker: UI
W03_EVAR_COMM_BABY_SLOTH_100_TITLE.text: Surrounded by Thralls: Tower of Sloth

W03_EVAR_COMM_BABY_SLOTH_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W03_EVAR_COMM_BABY_SLOTH_100_DETAIL.text: The Dismal King's thralls have surrounded the tower. There's no point in stopping here.

W03_EVAR_COMM_BABY_SLOTH_200_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W03_EVAR_COMM_BABY_SLOTH_200_DETAIL.text: There's no need to draw closer to the watchtower since you already flew past it.

W03_EVAR_COMM_BABY_TOWN_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W03_EVAR_COMM_BABY_TOWN_000_DETAIL.text: Will you find any of the king's thralls in the lifeless town? And if you do, will they be of any use?

W03_EVAR_COMM_BABY_RUIN_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W03_EVAR_COMM_BABY_RUIN_000_DETAIL.text: Will you find a way to smuggle the king to safety here?

W03_EVAR_COMM_BABY_FLY_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W03_EVAR_COMM_BABY_FLY_000_DETAIL.text: You can escape through here, but first you must overcome one more trial.

W03_EVAR_COMM_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W03_EVAR_COMM_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_DETAIL.text: If you can take the king from this world, his power will apparently return.

W03_EVAR_COMM_LEVELUP_BATTLE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W03_EVAR_COMM_LEVELUP_BATTLE_000_DETAIL.text: The air in the town is positively murderous. Though filled with both fiends and fierce warriors who seek to repel them, everyone is just fighting whoever's closest.
